title: Toxic Names
body:
How are people allowed to play with rude names, the people with these rude names are always the most toxic, ive seen people with names like "all aus sb" 
and "f u c k sargon" who just abuse in chat nonstop yet these people continue to play with day after day without a single ban whats the deal with that?

replies.body: There's another player who every game I've landed in that's incredibly toxic who's name is Heil Hitler and I report them every time never to getting graced by the message that I got them dealt sufficient punishment.

Having an offensive/innapropriate name is definitely reportable! 
Be sure to report the player in the end game screen under the "offensive/innapropriate summoner name". They won't receive bans, but instead are issued a tempname while they change to something more appropriate.

I was gonna choose omgYouSuckMoreSausageThanYourMumDidTheDayYouWereConcieved

But you know. . Character limit and all that jazz so... I went with the alternative. ....
JesusLovesYaMum
